sentences.english: To those I recommend using the Deathday Cake dating.
sentences.chinese: 对于那些人，我推荐用忌辰蛋糕来推算年份。

sentences.english: It should be added that it was also very nearly the 1st anniversary of the demise of Xin-er's mother.
sentences.chinese: 补说一句话，差不多也到新儿母亲的一周年忌辰了。

sentences.english: That Deathday Party, then, must take place in 1992.
sentences.chinese: 这样，这个忌辰晚会就一定是在1992年开的。

sentences.english: Party, then, must take place in 1992.
sentences.chinese: 这样，这个忌辰晚会就一定是在1992年开的。
